特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

【合併】総合日本学習科目（日本的ファイナンス入門）（CIEC）/Introductory Japanese Finance（国際学部）
関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, start-up and young businesses and their critical finance decisions, risk and return, valuation, time value of money, net present value, current issues and trends in finance, and finance and capital markets career opportunities.
授業方法: Hands-on practice (on paper/spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, case studies, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, and Power Point lecture slides

第1回:
Introduction
Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Classes – A Hands-On Exercise (Part 1)

Growing a Business assignment
Reading(s) on IPOs
Choose presentation topic
第2回: Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Classes – A Hands-On Exercise (Part 2)

Growing a Business project
Reading(s) on valuation
第3回: Valuation, time value of money (tvm), net present value (npv)
第4回: Reading(s) on investment banks, asset management
第5回: Reading(s) on equity investing, equity analysis
第6回:
Company earnings release project
Reading(s) on securities and assets
第8回:
Reading(s) on financial crises
Reading(s) on behavioral finance
第14回:
Student presentations
Career opportunities in finance and capital markets
